title.rendered: Kids Corner Week 6 + T-Shirt Design Winner

content.rendered:
Kids Corner Week 6

Get ready for Week Six of Kids Corner as we meet up with our toothy friends in “Dino Land!”

T-Shirt Design Winner and Runner-Ups

Our winning design is from Lisa Priest! These shirts will go into production in the coming weeks. We will announce their release in advance so that you can purchase your own!

We had fantastic submissions. Here are the two runner-ups from Katrina Rodeheaver and Madeline Martin, respectively. Thank you so much for your participation and your fabulous entries! We are thrilled that this contest inspired such great artwork.

 

Warehouse Makeover

Our world behind our bookstores is changing for the better. All the hustle and bustle at our warehouse in Byron, GA is heralding in a busy and productive July for Gottwals Books and Walls of Books! Just check out our new shelving system… it’s all in efforts to fill customer needs at all Gottwals Books and Walls of Books locations.
